properties.name: inputs.f0.value
properties.description: The first value in the sequence to be built.

properties.name: inputs.f1.value
properties.description: The second value in the sequence to be built.

properties.name: inputs.length.value
properties.description: The length of the sequence to build. (Note: must be >= 2).

properties.name: inputs.outputPath
properties.description: Output path for the JSON containing the sequence.
